pr_title: Throw error rather than just printing a warning

timeline.bodyText:
You can't use BugInCF up here, because it is outside of the corresponding try/catch that would do something useful with it. So in the unlikely event this would ever happen, an ugly stack trace will be shown.
The previous code produces separate understandable errors, which seems preferable.
How about undoing this change?
timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.bodyText: This change looks good and will indeed help us catch format string errors much easier.
timeline.author: wmdietl

timeline.message: Undo change, write comment about it
